/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings that reach up towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings. The perspective is from the left side of the street, looking towards the right, giving a sense of depth and scale to the image.
